newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan May first 10 days domestic WPI up 2% yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Japan May first 10 days domestic WPI up 2% yr/yr.

text.p: Japan's domestic wholesale price index (WPI), a key component of the overall WPI, rose 2.0 percent in the first 10 days of May from the same period last year, but remained unchanged from the previous 10-day period, the Bank of Japan (BOJ) said on Tuesday.
The overall WPI in the first 10 days of May was up 3.3 percent from a year ago but down 0.1 percent from the previous 10-day period, it said.
